name: Two Platform Hero
description:
The theme: This game had to fit the theme "Two", and it does so by having two platforms to jump across the entire time.

Assets: All of the assets were made by me

I had no time to make the music due to lack of time, and skill. Sorry for anyone out there who really likes video game music.

Credits:

I did most of the work, but my friend who goes by Rope Snake helped me play test, just wanted to give him some credit.
